DOC.brief_summary: Resilience mean healthcare provider 's ability cope , recover , learn stressful event , well access resource promote health well-being . Neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) health professional ' need particularly good resilience , work extremely stressful patient , fragile preterm infant , require undivided attention . The investigator propose feasible engage intervention enhance resilience among NICU health professional promote ability provide safe care .
DOC.brief_title: Web-based Implementation Science Enhancing Resilience Study
DOC.detailed_description: Optimizing provider well-being critical delivery safe high quality care vulnerable patient : preterm baby . Major innovative objective proposal include test Web-based Implementation Science Enhancing Resilience ( WISER ) program 's effectiveness enhance resilience among Neonatal Intensive Care Unit ( NICU ) health worker , evaluate effect unit safety culture , examine effect clinical outcome preterm infant . The WISER program establish low-intensity yet engage intervention , integrate education behavior modification boost provider well-being resilience order create organizational environment prevents patient harm . Care 50,000 low birth weight ( VLBW ; < 1500 gm ) infant bear annually United States challenge expensive . Quality care outcome vary widely . Increasing technical demand patient acuity push burnout among health worker break point . The tested intervention improve caregiver resilience lack feasibility widespread adoption . This study design achieve follow aim : 1 . Test effectiveness WISER improve NICU health professional resilience ; 2 . Test effectiveness WISER improve patient safety organizational outcome ; 3 . Test sustainability WISER ; 4 . Describe barrier facilitator WISER program . The investigator test efficacy WISER Program NICU set use stepped-wedge mixed-methods randomize control trial ( swRCT ) six tertiary care NICUs . The result trial also provide insight causal relation health worker resilience , organizational environment , clinical outcome among infant bear VLBW . Two block 3 NICUs randomly assign one two intervention cohort . The WISER NICUs program consist six 10-minute video deliver course six-month period . Following end initial intervention , NICU receive individualize feedback/refresher webinar 12 month , final follow-up 24 month . The investigator use measure perception ( surveys health professional 's perception ) quantifiable measure ( clinical measure ) assess efficacy intervention different domain ( resilience , organizational environment , health ) . Qualitative method provide insight facilitator barrier efficacy WISER .
